    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address getAddress()
      For ACCESS_VIOLATION events, returns the address at which the fault occurred.
      Address getPC()
      For BREAKPOINT, SINGLE_STEP, and ACCESS_VIOLATION events, returns the program counter at which the event occurred.
      ThreadProxy getThread()
      Retrieves the ThreadProxy for the thread on which the event occurred.
      DebugEvent.Type getType()
      The type of this debug event; BREAKPOINT, SINGLE_STEP, etc.
      java.lang.String getUnknownEventDetail()
      For UNKNOWN events, may return a detail message or may return null.
      boolean getWasWrite()
      For ACCESS_VIOLATION events, indicates whether the fault occurred on a write (vs.

      • getThread

        public ThreadProxy getThread()
        Description copied from interface: DebugEvent
        Retrieves the ThreadProxy for the thread on which the event occurred. This is always present.
        Specified by:
        getThread in interface DebugEvent

      • getPC

        public Address getPC()
        Description copied from interface: DebugEvent
        For BREAKPOINT, SINGLE_STEP, and ACCESS_VIOLATION events, returns the program counter at which the event occurred. For other types of events returns an undefined value.
        Specified by:
        getPC in interface DebugEvent

      • getWasWrite

        public boolean getWasWrite()
        Description copied from interface: DebugEvent
        For ACCESS_VIOLATION events, indicates whether the fault occurred on a write (vs. a read). For other types of events returns an undefined value.
        Specified by:
        getWasWrite in interface DebugEvent

      • getAddress

        public Address getAddress()
        Description copied from interface: DebugEvent
        For ACCESS_VIOLATION events, returns the address at which the fault occurred. For LOADOBJECT_LOAD and LOADOBJECT_UNLOAD events, returns the base address of the loadobject in the target process's address space. For other types of events returns an undefined value.
        Specified by:
        getAddress in interface DebugEvent

      • getUnknownEventDetail

        public java.lang.String getUnknownEventDetail()
        Description copied from interface: DebugEvent
        For UNKNOWN events, may return a detail message or may return null. For other types of events returns an undefined value.
        Specified by:
        getUnknownEventDetail in interface DebugEvent
